semantic.$description: Colors to communicate purpose. They help users to convey messages.

categorical.$description: Colors intended for data visualisations. Adhere to the specified numerical order.

default.$description: Use for primary text, such as body copy, sentence case headers, and buttons.

@disabled.$description: Use for text in a disabled state.

@selected.$description: Use for text in selected or opened states, such as tabs and dropdown buttons.

@inverse.$description: Use for text on bold backgrounds.

defaultBlur.$description: This is the default layer blur description

blur.$description: This is the layer blur description

level3.$description: This is the shadow 3 description updated

size.$description: Size units for sizing and spacing elements
